meanings.definition: To have been provided with bumpers.
meanings.sent1: The car was bumpered to prevent damage in case of a collision.
meanings.sent2: The mechanic bumpered the vehicle before sending it out for a test drive.
meanings.sent3: The bumper company bumpered the car with care and precision.
meanings.sent4: She bumpered her belongings with extra padding to keep them safe during the move.
meanings.sent5: The child's bike was bumpered with colorful foam to make it more fun and safe to ride.

meanings.definition: To have been protected by bumpers.
meanings.sent1: The car was bumpered during the accident, saving it from major damage.
meanings.sent2: The antique furniture was carefully bumpered during the move to avoid any scratches.
meanings.sent3: The clumsy waiter bumpered the fragile dishes, preventing any accidents.
meanings.sent4: Her heart was bumpered by the love and support of her friends during a difficult time.
meanings.sent5: The fragile package was bumpered with bubble wrap to ensure it arrived safely at its destination.
